Title: Authorizes an optional 20-year retirement benefits plan for Elmira traffic officers
Summary: Authorizes an optional 20-year retirement plan for traffic officers employed by the town of Elmira, who submit an application therefor within one year of the effective date of such provisions, or within one year of start of employment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the retirement of traffic officers with the town of Elmira
